IMAGE_COMPRESSION.TITLE: Image Compression ({compression}%)
IMAGE_COMPRESSION.LOSSLESS_TIP: PNG compression is lossless, so it might not reduce the file size significantly and higher compression values might affect the performance. JPG and WebP compression is lossy.

CUSTOM_MODELS.INFO: You can add your own models easily. For more details:

CUSTOM_INPUT_RESOLUTION.CUSTOM_WIDTH_TIP: Use a custom width for the output images. The height will be adjusted automatically. Enabling this will override the scale setting.

DONATE.IF_LIKED: If you like what we do :)

GPU_ID_INPUT.READ_DOCS: Please read the Upscayl Documentation for more information.
GPU_ID_INPUT.ENABLE_PERF_MODE: Enable performance mode on Windows for better results.

IMAGE_SCALE.TITLE: Image Scale
IMAGE_SCALE.AI_UPSCALE_RESIZE_INFO: Anything above 4X (except 16X Double Upscayl) only resizes the image and does not use AI upscaling.

OVERWRITE_TOGGLE.OW_TIP: If enabled, Upscayl will process the image again instead of loading it directly.

RESET_SETTINGS.TITLE: RESET UPSCAYL
RESET_SETTINGS.ON_RESET: Upscayl has been reset. Please restart the app.

SAVE_OUTPUT_FOLDER.TITLE: SAVE OUTPUT FOLDER
SAVE_OUTPUT_FOLDER.DESC: If enabled, the output folder will be remembered between sessions.

CUSTOM_TILE_SIZE.TITLE: CUSTOM TILE SIZE
CUSTOM_TILE_SIZE.DESC: Use a custom tile size for segmenting the image. This can help process images faster by reducing the number of tiles generated.

TURN_OFF_NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: TURN OFF NOTIFICATIONS
TURN_OFF_NOTIFICATIONS.DESC: If enabled, Upscayl will not send any system notifications on success or failure.

BATCH.TITLE: Batch Upscayl
BATCH.TT_INFO: This will let you Upscayl all files in a folder at once

DOUBLE_UPSCAYL.TITLE: Double Upscayl
DOUBLE_UPSCAYL.TT_INFO: Enable this option to run upscayl twice on an image. Note that this may cause a significant increase in processing time and possibly performance issues for scales greater than 4X.

STEP_3.TITLE: Step 3
STEP_3.MACOS_RESTRICTION_ALERT:
Due to MacOS App Store security restrictions, Upscayl requires you to select an output folder everytime you start it.

To avoid this, you can permanently save a default output folder in the Upscayl 'Settings' tab.

STEP_4.TITLE: Step 4
STEP_4.FOLDER_ALERT: Please select an output folder first

RIGHT_PANE_INFO.NOTE_SPECIFIC_FORMATS_IN_FOLDER: Make sure that the folder doesn't contain anything except PNG, JPG, JPEG & WEBP images.
RIGHT_PANE_INFO.SELECT_IMAGES: Select or drag and drop a PNG, JPG, JPEG or WEBP image.

GPU_ERROR.TITLE: GPU Error
GPU_ERROR.DESC: Ran into an issue with the GPU. Please read the docs for troubleshooting! ({data})

READ_WRITE_ERROR.TITLE: Read/Write Error
READ_WRITE_ERROR.DESC:
Make sure that the path is correct and you have proper read/write permissions 
({data})

TILE_SIZE_ERROR.TITLE: Error
TILE_SIZE_ERROR.DESC: The tile size is wrong. Please change the tile size in the settings or set to 0 ({data})

EXCEPTION_ERROR.TITLE: Exception Error
EXCEPTION_ERROR.DESC: Upscayl encountered an error. Possibly, the upscayl binary failed to execute the commands properly. Try checking the logs to see if you get any information. You can post an issue on Upscayl's GitHub repository for more help.

INVALID_IMAGE_ERROR.TITLE: Invalid Image
INVALID_IMAGE_ERROR.DESC: Please select an image with a valid extension like PNG, JPG, JPEG, or WEBP.
INVALID_IMAGE_ERROR.DRAG_DESC: Please drag and drop an image

NO_IMAGE_ERROR.TITLE: No image selected
NO_IMAGE_ERROR.DESC: Please select an image to upscale

IMAGE_SCALE_WARN.PERF_ISSUE: Anything above 5X may cause performance issues on some devices!
IMAGE_SCALE_WARN.PERF_ISSUE_DEVICE: This may cause performance issues on some devices!

Upscayl_Cloud.CATCHY_PHRASE_1: No more errors, hardware issues, quality compromises or long loading times!
